title: Stoneweave on Beige Malachite - samples
description: plain weave or variation thereof, using a beige/lt. gold warp #19.  See individual pcs for indv info Beige & lt olive warp. Drk & lt tan, cream & yellow weft. 2 weft sections. top  1.5 woven with drk & lt tan. Bottom 3.5 woven with cream & yellow. (beige, lt olive, drk & lt tan, cream & yellow)
